member.name: T:Tomlyn.Toml
member.summary: Main entry class to parse, validate and transform to a model a TOML document.

member.name: F:Tomlyn.Toml.Version
member.summary: Shows version

member.name: M:Tomlyn.Toml.Parse(System.String,System.String,Tomlyn.TomlParserOptions)
member.summary: Parses a text to a TOML document.
member.param: A string representing a TOML document
An optional path/file name to identify errors
Options for parsing. Default is parse and validate.
member.returns: A parsed TOML document

member.name: M:Tomlyn.Toml.Parse(System.Byte[],System.String,Tomlyn.TomlParserOptions)
member.summary: Parses a UTF8 byte array to a TOML document.
member.param: A UTF8 string representing a TOML document
An optional path/file name to identify errors
Options for parsing. Default is parse and validate.
member.returns: A parsed TOML document

member.name: M:Tomlyn.Toml.Validate(Tomlyn.Syntax.DocumentSyntax)
member.summary: Validates the specified TOML document.
member.returns: The same instance as the parameter. Check and for details.

member.name: M:Tomlyn.Toml.FromModel(System.Object,Tomlyn.TomlModelOptions)
member.summary: Gets the TOML string representation from the specified model.
member.returns: The TOML string representation from the specified model.
member.exception: If there are errors while trying to serialize to a TOML string.

member.name: M:Tomlyn.Toml.TryFromModel(System.Object,System.String@,Tomlyn.Syntax.DiagnosticsBag@,Tomlyn.TomlModelOptions)
member.summary: Tries to get the TOML string representation from the specified model.
member.param: The model instance to serialize to TOML.
The TOML string representation from the specified model if this method returns true.
The diagnostics error messages if this method returns false.
member.returns: The TOML string representation from the specified model.
true if the conversion was successful; false otherwise.

member.name: M:Tomlyn.Toml.TryFromModel(System.Object,System.IO.TextWriter,Tomlyn.Syntax.DiagnosticsBag@,Tomlyn.TomlModelOptions)
member.summary: Tries to get the TOML string representation from the specified model.
member.param: The model instance to serialize to TOML.
The TOML string representation written to a if this method returns true.
The diagnostics error messages if this method returns false.
member.returns: The TOML string representation from the specified model.
true if the conversion was successful; false otherwise.

member.name: F:Tomlyn.TomlModelOptions.DefaultCreateInstance
member.summary: Default member to create an instance.

member.name: F:Tomlyn.TomlModelOptions.DefaultConvertPropertyName
member.summary: Default convert name using snake case via help .

member.name: F:Tomlyn.TomlModelOptions.DefaultConvertFieldName
member.summary: Default convert name using snake case via help .

member.name: P:Tomlyn.TomlModelOptions.GetPropertyName
member.summary: Gets or sets the delegate to retrieve a name from a property. If this function returns null, the property is ignored.

member.name: P:Tomlyn.TomlModelOptions.GetFieldName
member.summary: Gets or sets the delegate to retrieve a field from a property. If this function returns null, the field is ignored.

member.name: P:Tomlyn.TomlModelOptions.ConvertPropertyName
member.summary: Gets or sets the delegate used to convert the name of the property to the name used in TOML. By default, it is using snake case via .
member.remarks: This delegate is used by the default delegate.

member.name: P:Tomlyn.TomlModelOptions.ConvertFieldName
member.summary: Gets or sets the delegate used to convert the name of the field to the name used in TOML. By default, it is using snake case via .
member.remarks: This delegate is used by the default delegate.

member.name: P:Tomlyn.TomlModelOptions.CreateInstance
member.summary: Gets or sets the function used when deserializing from TOML to create instance of objects. Default is set to . The arguments of the function are: - The type to create an instance for. - The expected from a TOML perspective. Returns an instance according to the type and the expected .

member.name: P:Tomlyn.TomlModelOptions.ConvertTo
member.summary:
Gets or sets the convert function called when deserializing a value from TOML to a model (e.g string to Uri).
Must return null if cannot convert. The arguments of the function are: - The input object value to convert. - The target type to convert to.
Returns an instance of target type converted from the input value or null if conversion is not supported.

member.name: P:Tomlyn.TomlModelOptions.ConvertToModel
member.summary:
Gets or sets the convert function called when deserializing a value from TOML to a model (e.g string to Uri).
Must return null if cannot convert. The arguments of the function are: - The input object value to convert. - The target type to convert to.
Returns an instance of target type converted from the input value or null if conversion is not supported.

member.name: P:Tomlyn.TomlModelOptions.ConvertToToml
member.summary: Gets or sets the convert function called when serializing a value from a model to a TOML representation. This function allows to substitute a value to another type before converting (e.g Uri to string).

member.name: P:Tomlyn.TomlModelOptions.AttributeListForIgnore
member.summary: Gets the list of the attributes used to ignore a property.

member.name: P:Tomlyn.TomlModelOptions.AttributeListForGetName
member.summary: Gets the list of the attributes used to fetch the property `Name`.

member.name: P:Tomlyn.TomlModelOptions.IgnoreMissingProperties
member.summary: Gets or sets the option to ignore properties in the TOML that are missing from a custom model

member.name: P:Tomlyn.TomlModelOptions.IncludeFields
member.summary: Gets or sets the option to include fields from a custom model in the TOML

member.summary: Default implementation for getting the property name

member.summary: Default implementation for getting the field name
